page.title: 15Changes in Saffron Walden
page.content: Twenty years ago the population was less than 10,000. Today it is about 18,000. Most of the new people live on the Fairview Estate to the south of town and the Wimpey Estate to the north-east. All these people have brought about a traffic problem in Saffron Walden where it is difficult to park. The bus services are not very frequent so those without cars are handicapped because most people in this sort of well off town are assumed to have cars. Not many of the newcomers work in the area so this is changing the character of the town.
